tagLine: Java helped my child think logically about the future.
whatYouWillLearn: You will learn secret tips of Freelance Web Designers and how they make great money freelancing online.
You will learn secret tips of Freelance Web Designers and how they make great money freelancing online.
description: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning are shaping the world, and our program introduces kids to these exciting fields in a simple, engaging way. They’ll learn about algorithms, data, and how machines think, sparking their curiosity and preparing them for future opportunities. It’s about making complex concepts accessible and inspiring young innovators.

modules.name: Introduction to Chess and Basic Rules - 6 Classes

chapters.name: Overview of the Chessboard
chapters.description: The chessboard setup: 8x8 grid and the names of the squares (rank, file, and diagonals)

chapters.name: Introduction to the Pieces
chapters.description: Names, movement, and value of each piece: King, Queen, Rook, Knight, Bishop, Pawn

chapters.name: Piece Movement and Basic Principles
chapters.description: Basic goal: checkmate the opponent’s king, What check and checkmate are, and how they work

chapters.name: The Objective of the Game
chapters.description: Basic goal: checkmate the opponent’s king, What check and checkmate are, and how they work

chapters.name: How to Start the Game: The Initial Setup
chapters.description: First few moves and basic opening principles (control the center, develop your pieces, avoid moving the same piece twice early)

chapters.name: Basic Chess Terminology
chapters.description: Key terms: Check, checkmate, castling, en passant, promotion, draw, etc.

chapterNames: How to Start the Game: The Initial Setup
